page.title: 10 TRAFFIC SURVEY
page.content: We have been conducting a survey of {traffic}using the{A4043}in{Pontnewyn- {ydd. {At 9:00}we counted in 15 minutes,{67 {cars, 1 motorbike 3 vans and a bus using the road between{Pontypool and {Abersychan. {At 1:30.}our count for a quarter of an hour showed{127 cars, 5 motorbikes, {11 vans and 5 buses}used the road. { At 3:00}we took our last count and in 15 minutes{125 cars, 4 motorbikes, 25 {vans, 7 lorries, a minibus and 3 buses used the road. {Paul thought}lunch time was the busiest because people used their cars to go to town lunchtime. We noticed that{Welsh Water and Torfaen Authority vehicles used the road regularly. {I think}it would be better if there was a{by-pass around Pontypool}so that it would't be so busy and dangerous.
